# Issue Template

Please use this template to report issues related to articles or small code
snippets in this repository.

Title:
Article reference (URL or ID):
Type: [typo / content / question / code snippet]

Description:
Provide a concise description of the issue or question.

Suggested fix or extra context:
If you have a suggested fix, paste it here. For code snippets, include a
minimal reproducible example.

Code snippet (if applicable):

```
// paste code here
```

Screenshots or attachments:
Attach images or provide links if helpful.

Priority: [low / medium / high]
